Name: Rhythm Overdrive
About the game: Rhythm Overdrive is a shootem up / rhythm game, where ennemies are trying to kill you while dancing on the songs BPM ! Collect power ups to enhance your weapons, use bombs to clean the screen from all the ennemies, and make the greatest score possible with the combo multiplier to get the first place on the leaderboards ! You donâ€™t need to kill all the ennemies, but more kills = more SCORE ! - 2 DIFFICULTY MODES - 15 SONGS FROM 4 DIFFERENT ARTISTS - 30 LEVELS WITH LEADERBOARDS - 10 DIFFERENTS ENEMIES - 6 DIFFERENT WEAPONS - 4 SKINS FOR YOUR STARSHIP - 29 ACHIEVEMENTS WARNING: Lots of flashing colors!
